mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` ( version, is_parent, position, team_id, username, `name`, account_id, is_display )VALUES( 0, #{isParent}, #{position}, #{teamId}, #{username}, #{name}, #{accountId}, #{isDisplay} )ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE version=version+1, `name`=#{name}
mapper.sql: id, version, is_parent, position, team_id, username, `name`, account_id, is_display
mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.version, u.is_parent, u.position, u.team_id, u.username, u.`name`, u.account_id, u.is_display FROM `user` u INNER JOIN outer_data_user o ON u.id=o.user_id
WHERE o.client=#{client} AND o.outer_id=#{outerId}
